name: Planet Run
description:
Welcome to Planet Run !

The aim of the game?
You're on a planet , you have to move and go to the blue balls with the joystick.
But be careful, there are obstacles and if you hit them , you lose .
More you go up in levels, the more difficult it is growing .
All this without ads!

The game work with a controller.

Planet Run on Windows : https://mega.nz/#!LMkFWDYI!RzWFf_NpCE-Q9zFCjRc6DRSnOYC66OWZzSARZ5Fmhzo

My Twitter : https://twitter.com/Electromicro1

My blog :  https://electronicmicropro.wixsite.com/electromicro
Remember to share the game and report bugs me that they are corrected .
Thank you!
